pages.text: A strong, flexible material capable of binding tool components. $(br2)Can also be climbed similar to scaffold, but only if attached to blocks on the top. The rope can be extended to ground level by right clicking with more rope. When broken, it drops all the ropes blocks at the top.
The simplest and earliest method of obtaining plant fibers. Grass can be harvested using a $(l:tools/knives)Knife$(). Other recipes for plant fibers include types of vines, ferns and jute.
